result.markdown: --- title: "Week 9: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * AR, MA, ARMA and ARIMA models * Selecting model orders manually and automatically ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 9.3-9.8 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) * Complete Exercises 6-10 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html). * [Solutions to Exercises](ex9-sol.qmd) * [Recorded tutorial code](tutorial_code.R) ## Monday lecture Download slides [Code used in seminar](seminar_code.R) ## Tuesday workshop [Activities for Tuesday workshop](activities.qmd) [Code used in workshop](workshop_code.R) ## Assignments * [Assignment 3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Tuesday 20 May. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 9 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868374) is due on Sunday 11 May.
